imdb.plot outline: The Production focuses on the protagonist, a world-weary FBI agent, who's interstate murder case leads him into the world of international drug trafficking and murder, which leads eventually to the door of the Central Intelligence Agency and a connection to drug trafficking in Los Angeles through cartels and financing of the Nicaragua civil war during the 1980's.
imdb.title: Smoking Gun: A Murder Mystery
akas: Smoking Gun: A Murder Mystery (United Kingdom)
plot: The Production focuses on the protagonist, a world-weary FBI agent, who's interstate murder case leads him into the world of international drug trafficking and murder, which leads eventually to the door of the Central Intelligence Agency and a connection to drug trafficking in Los Angeles through cartels and financing of the Nicaragua civil war during the 1980's.::Sutish Sharma
